attributes.action: cease providing former Prime Ministers with armed police protection officers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Former Prime Ministers are currently provided with armed personal protection officers for themselves and their families once they have left office.

These officers – who should be used for frontline policing duties – are funded by the taxpayer.

If former Prime Ministers feel that they are at risk and need protection, then they should be required to fund their own protection officers from within the private security sector.

We therefore petition the Prime Minister to cease providing former Prime Ministers with armed police protection officers at public expense.
